name: slenderness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being thin and delicate, often in a way that is attractive : He emphasised his elegant slenderness in close-fitting garments of black satin. We tend to associate slenderness with all kinds of positive attributes, from self-control to intelligence.
the quality of being small in amount or degree : They had many bad moments, thinking of the slenderness of their resources. The slenderness of her victory surprised everyone. See
slender
More examplesFewer examplesHer remarkable slenderness was mostly concealed under a pair of baggy black trousers.The church dominates the town with a tower and spire of subtly alarming slenderness and height.The slenderness of the chances of anything being built as a result of the competition was revealed.The slenderness of their means does not allow them to enlarge their businesses.
